{{Wired embedded system |brand=USRobotics |model=USR8000 |revision=-02 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |is_manuf=No |manuf=AMIT |type=router |cpu1_brand=AMIT |cpu1_model=AMITSOC-0261 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=256 KiB |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=HY9F002TC-70 |ram1=2 MiB |ram1_brand=GLT |ram1_model=GLT5160L16-7TC |expansion_if_types=Parallel |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atan |sw_model=AT8985P |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 }} :[http://support.usr.com/support/product-template.asp?prod=8000a02 Product page]
*[https://gathering.tweakers.net/forum/list_message/22499123#22499123 ''USRobotics USR8000'' on '''gathering.tweakers.net''' thread] :This device to be using the [[AMIT]] ''AMITSOC-0261'' CPU
===See also=== :;[https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_models&manufacturer_id=3 D-Link Models] *[[D-Link DI-604]] (UP) *[[D-Link DI-604 rev D1]]/D2 • [http://www.szetszedtem.hu/342dlink-604/router.htm PCB images] *[[D-Link DI-604 rev F1]]/F4 *[[D-Link DI-704P rev B]] (B1/B2/B3) • [http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/index.html Hardware] :CPU: [[AMIT]] AMITSOC-0261 (@143MHz) :Flash: 256KB Flash (''Hynix'' HY9F002TC-70) :RAM: 2MB DRAM (''GLT'' GLT5160L16-7TC) :LAN: 5-port switch (''Atan Technology'' AT8985P) :Printer port, no JTAG, unfinished serial *[[D-Link DI-704P rev C1]]/C2 (A1, B1, B2, B3) • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=30 WP] *[[D-Link DI-707P rev C1]]/C2 (A1, B1, B2, B3) • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=31 WP] *[https://m.kbench.com/?q=node/17081 Magic IP Sky v6] (CPU: [[AMIT]] AMITSOC-0261)
==Images== https://tweakers.net/i/Z2m35-Z-M3029KCmGc1OsDQ2U1w=/full-fit-in/4000x4000/filters:no_upscale():fill(white):gifsicle():strip_exif()/f/image/Aqf1PQTlv1zm6Z0wgWBH76Rh.gif https://images.kbench.com/kbench/article/2002_12/k17081p1n6.jpg ---- https://images.kbench.com/kbench/article/2002_12/k17081p1n5.jpg
